shortdesc.ph: The index of multi-quality layered video streams.

plentry.pd: (0): The layer_1 multi-quality layered video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than STREAM_HIGH.
(0): The layer_1 video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than STREAM_HIGH.
(1): The layer_2 multi-quality layered video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(1): The layer_2 video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(1): The layer_2 multi-quality layered video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(2): The layer_3 multi-quality layered video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(2): The layer_3 video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(2): The layer_3 multi-quality layered video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(3): The layer_4 multi-quality layered video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(3): The layer_4 video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(3): The layer_4 multi-quality layered video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(4): The layer_5 multi-quality layered video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(4): The layer_5 video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(4): The layer_5 multi-quality layered video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(5): The layer_6 multi-quality layered video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(5): The layer_6 video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(5): The layer_6 multi-quality layered video stream, with resolution and bitrate lower than .
(6): Low-quality video stream with the lowest resolution and bitrate.
(7): The maximum number of multi-quality video stream layers.
(7): The maximum number of video stream layers.
